title: Mark Cavendish Hits Another Pothole in Path to Tour de France as Racing Return Delayed
content:
Manxman sidelined from Scheldeprijs after struggles with sickness, will not return to the peloton until mid-april.

Read the full article at Mark Cavendish Hits Another Pothole in Path to Tour de France as Racing Return Delayed on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
